𒁼 = 𒁺 𒆦 DU GUNU

𒁺 RE₆/GIN > 𒁼 origin gene

𒁺 RE₆ > 𒁼 ri₆šu ریشه riše ῥίζα rhíza roots 𓍯 𓄿 𓃀 𓆰 roabt (source)

𒁼 šuršu شرش šereš š-r-š source, root

𒁼 išdu = 𒋗𒁺 ŠUʳDU 𒁼 išdu išdumₓ a stem "root" Akk.

𒁼 išdu إِشَادَة ʔišāda 𐎊𐎒𐎄 ysd יסוד ייסוד yesud "foundation, base (of building)".

𒁼 išdu <> أَصْل ʔaṣl أُصُول ʔuṣūl "root"

𒁼 išdu <> 礎 ishizu أَسَاس ʔasās ба́зис bázis בָּסִיס bɑsis

𒁼 šuršu ≈ 創立 sōritsu <> σύσταση sýstasi

From the root ܫ-ܪ-ܫ (š-r-š) related to taking root. Compare Akkadian 𒁼 (/šuršu/), Arabic شِرْش (širš), Hebrew שֹׁרֶשׁ (šṓreš), Ugaritic 𐎌𐎗𐎌 (šrš), and Ge'ez ሥርው (śərw).

  • (botany) root
  • ground, base, foundation
  • ball of thread or cotton
  • beginning
  • principle

Latin surgō surge, raise causative

⇔ זרע sart > Saát 𓇡 > seed

𒁺𒁼 du.re₆šu ίδρυση ídrysi "address" founding
